projects.title: Vision-Based Planar Damage Segmentation & Laser Cladding Path Planning System
projects.description: Built a vision-based system for 2D planar damage segmentation and automatic laser cladding path planning, from camera image to ABB/FANUC robot code.

projects.title: SO101 · Lift Cube (IsaacLab RL)
projects.description: Trained an RL policy in IsaacLab (manage-based environment) for the SO101 gripper to grasp and lift a cube.

projects.title: Delivery Robot AprilTag IR Localization
projects.description: Pose accuracy test of a restaurant delivery robot based on AprilTag, with an **infrared-enhanced AprilTag perception stack** for robust localization under real-world lighting and clutter.

projects.title: Visual-tactile sensor grasping
projects.description: Combine single-image 6D pose estimation with **GelSight Mini** fingertip tactile sensing to detect slip, surface texture, and contact deformation for robust grasping.

projects.title: SO-ARM101 MoveIt in Isaac Sim
projects.description: Control the SO-ARM101 manipulator with MoveIt + ROS 2, and connect it to Isaac Sim via topic-based ros2_control.

projects.title: Camera 2D LiDAR Joint Calibration
projects.description: Reproduced a GitHub camera–LiDAR calibration method, adapted it to a camera + 2D LiDAR setup, and documented it as an internal SOP.
